heuristic.name: Algorithm
heuristic.description: The algorithm employed for the abstract propagation. Complete performs exact abstract interpretation, Approximate performs incomplete abstract interpretation and Mixed refines one neuron per layer

heuristic.name: Refinement heuristic
heuristic.description: Branching heuristic to employ in the refinement

intersection.name: Intersection strategy
intersection.description: Strategy to compute the intersection. bounds_lp is faster, star_lp is more precise

timeout.name: Timeout
timeout.description: Stop criteria for the algorithm in seconds
